    Jacob R. Romeo - Astrophysics PhD Student

    Exploring the interiors of stars through Asteroseismology and precision stellar astrophysics.

    Download CV

    Welcome! 👋

    I’m Jacob R. Romeo, a PhD student in astrophysics with a focus on asteroseismology, stellar structure, and time-domain astronomy. I use data from missions like TESS and Kepler to probe the interiors of stars through their oscillations.

    This site is a hub for my:

    • 📚 Current Research
    • 📄 Publications
    • 🛠️ Projects
    • 📥 CV

    Whether you’re a fellow researcher, student, or just curious about stars that sing, feel free to explore — and don’t hesitate to get in touch!

    “The stars are the landmines of truth waiting to be unearthed by science.”
    — Someone probably
